content: this darling crochet bag is a granny style bag featuring a puffy granny square and purchased leather handles easy to follow crochet pattern with detailed instructions note this is a listing for a downloadable pdf pattern to crochet your own bag skill level intermediate pattern is written in english using standard american terms > please note that this pattern is > available for free on my blog > here 1 the benefit of purchasing > this pdf is an easy to read > printable and ad-free version of the > pattern size finished bag is approximately 15 wide by 11 tall excluding the handles or 18 tall with the handles materials needed - worsted weight yarn exact brand and color provided - crochet hook size g 6/4 0 mm - purchased leather handles - tapestry needle pattern will be available for instant download upon payment the pattern and photographs of this design are the property of crochet 365 knit too this pattern and design are subject to copyright and are for personal non-commercial use only you may not distribute or sell this pattern under any circumstances due to the nature of the product there will be no refunds after purchase 1 https //www crochet365knittoo com/fall-in-bloom-bag/
